scripts.dev: concurrently 'npm run dev --prefix app' 'npm run dev --prefix api'
scripts.build: concurrently 'npm run build --prefix app' 'npm run build --prefix api'
scripts.start: concurrently 'npm run start --prefix app' 'npm run start --prefix api'
scripts.test: npm run test:api && npm run test:app
scripts.postinstall: npm i --prefix app && npm i --prefix api
